name: Keep It Rising, Stupid!
description:
Hello there! This game was made for a Game Jam (Game Jam Online 2020 from Chile exactly), the objective of the game is to go the higher you can, if you fall over the screen you'll die instantly. To climb higher you have to slide your finger and jump between the rafters. Keep It Rising, Stupid! offers you a lot of skins with beautiful trails and other items. We're a small group of friends who want to create games and make a living from it, obviously we are newbies and we want to know your opinion regarding our game to improve.

-FroG team.

[Mini Update]

-Added a tutorial.

[V0.4 Mini Update]

-Added menu "How to Play"

-Small changes to menus

-Gameplay balanced
